title: Elected Board Member
organization: MIT Graduate Student Council's External Affairs Board
description: Elected as a board member of the MIT Graduate Student Council's External Affairs Board, where I represent the interests of international students at MIT.
impact: Represent the interests of international students at MIT

title: MIT EECS GAAP Mentor
description: Provided individualized mentorship to underrepresented PhD applicants, including in depth feedback on research statements, CVs and guidance on research interests and application strategy.
impact: Provided individualized mentorship to underrepresented PhD applicants

title: Bengali Translator for COVID-19 Patients
description: Provided emergency Bengali translation services to COVID-19 patients during Singapore's migrant worker COVID outbreak via an on-call service in shifts. Translated for over 15 patients & front-line doctors at the National Centre for Infectious Diseases.
impact: Translated for over 15 patients & front-line doctors
On-call service during critical COVID-19 outbreak period

title: Bengali Translator for Migrant Workers
description: Surveyed Bengali migrant workers on their emotional health & translated COVID-19 related information posters for Bengali migrant workers living in dormitories.
impact: Surveyed migrant workers on emotional health
